title: Ticket #6642: Support spaces in remapped file paths
description: Currently all spaces are stripped from the filename remaps in filename_remap_find. This is used for the out and error parameters in the submit file which since ticket 6389 landed condor_submit permits to have spaces, but note that transfer_output_remaps in the submit file is also affected by this and was untouched by ticket #6389. The attached patch changes things that so instead only leading and trailing spaces are removed from each component in this function (the removal of all tab and newline characters is retained).
remarks:
2018-Sep-13 10:35:06 by quintinhill:
Is there any further update on this?

2018-Sep-13 13:17:53 by coatsworth:
Hi Quintin, sorry we've been slow on this. I tried merging your code a few weeks ago and it passed everything in our test suite. However I'm really not familiar with how filename remaps work, and the person who is has been away a lot this summer.

I'll ping them again and try to follow up shortly.

2018-Sep-19 15:38:27 by coatsworth:
This is included now and will be available in our next development series release. Sorry again for the long delay.
